verses.name: Genesis 37:24
verses.text: And they took him, and cast him into a pit: and the pit was empty, there was no water in it.

verses.name: Genesis 37:25
verses.text: And they sat down to eat bread: and they lifted up their eyes and looked, and, behold, a company of Ishmeelites came from Gilead with their camels bearing spicery and balm and myrrh, going to carry it down to Egypt.

verses.name: Genesis 37:26
verses.text: And Judah said unto his brethren, What profit is it if we slay our brother, and conceal his blood?
